about_the_game:
Play fast. Play the past.


Now you can try out Vengeance without paying anything



Vengeance is an old-modern-school shooter. Paradox! But not quite:
Today's modern shooters feature a lot of microtransactions and loot boxes in most cases. Vengeance does not feature any of that! If you liked online shooter from the 2007-era, you will absolutely love Vengeance!

Key Features of the Demo version!

  • No Microtransactions
  • 8 Close combat map for all types of FPS players
  • 3 Weapons
  • Full bot support
  • Custom sprays to use in-game via Steam Workshop

Key Features of the Fullversion

  • No Microtransactions
  • 6 Close combat maps for all types of FPS players
  • More than 20 Weapons
  • Old school modes
  • Full bot support
  • Custom sprays to use in-game via Steam Workshop

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Old-modern-school shooter with a focus on the player. Play one of the fastest multiplayer games out there! Play fast. Play the past!
